message: I have a great deal for you on this product! Would you like to buy it from me?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that. I can meet you in the middle at $136. Would you be interested in that price?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you try to go lower? I'd be willing to meet you at $132
I can see you're really interested in the product! I can try to meet you at $133. Is that a deal?
I'm getting close, but I still need to stretch my budget a bit further. Can you try to meet me at $130 again?
